In the MATTER OF L.R. and C.R. (Minor Children), Children in Need of Services, M.R. (Mother) and R.R. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A05-1711-JC-2706 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed April 11, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

NAJAM , J.

Affirmed.

ROBB, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
